ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Device timestamp (date and time) when readings are recorded
Device time zone when readings are recorded
Transdermal alcohol concentration (ug/L)
Skin temperature of the subject wearing device in degree Celsius
Motion of the subject wearing Skyn (g)
Notes: g-unit, acceleration G-force or force of acceleration; 1g = 9.8 m/s^2

ElementDescription: Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) area under the curve for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Duration of rising Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Duration of falling Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Area under the rising portion of Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Area under the falling portion of Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Social date
Notes: MM/DD/YYYY. Social day is from 9am-9am (when morning survey opened)

ElementDescription: Skyn sensor wear compliance per social day
Peak Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) rise rate for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) fall rate (reversed to be positive) for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) fall rate for social day - recoded for nondrinking days
Total positive Transdermal Alcohol Concentration (TAC) duration for social day - recoded for nondrinking days

I am willing to wear a small device on my wrist for [X] days. I understand that the device will measure my alcohol concentration and WILL NOT RECORD ANY OTHER INFORMATION such as your location, voice, etc.
[X] days
Are you putting on or removing your sensor?
What time did you do this? If you just put on or removed the sensor, select the current time.
Why are you removing your sensor?
Notes: 1= To shower; 2= To charge; 3= Because it's Sunday morning; 4= Other

ElementDescription: Please specify why are you removing your sensor.
